sections.heading: Terms, defined.As used in section 48-120, unless the context otherwise requires:(1) Plastic surgery shall mean that branch of surgery concerned with the repair or restoration of lost, injured, or deformed body parts chiefly by transfer of tissue; and(2) Reconstructive surgery shall mean surgery whic
sections.text: Terms, defined.As used in section 48-120, unless the context otherwise requires:(1) Plastic surgery shall mean that branch of surgery concerned with the repair or restoration of lost, injured, or deformed body parts chiefly by transfer of tissue; and(2) Reconstructive surgery shall mean surgery which restores or tends to restore an injured or deformed structure.SourceLaws 1978, LB 529, ยง 1.
